body_html: Ok, in that case monotonic attention should work - wanted to make sure you weren't reversing the input sequence, as people sometimes do in MT. Let's get Bahdanau monotonic attention working for you since that's what I had worked with for speech.

body: Ok, in that case monotonic attention should work - wanted to make sure you weren't reversing the input sequence, as people sometimes do in MT.  Let's get Bahdanau monotonic attention working for you since that's what I had worked with for speech.
